.. _live:

Live
""""

.. raw:: html

   <div class="col-md-9">


To view the dashboard you'll need to download mdl-dashboard standalone app built in``electron``::

    pip install git+https://github.com/risoms/mdl-dashboard.git

On the  you'll download the mdl package in ``github``::

    pip install git+https://github.com/risoms/IMHR-R33.git

Another option would be to to clone the `github repository
<https://github.com/risoms/IMHR-R33>`_ and install from your local copy::

    pip install .
